basicInfo.name: Himanshu Aggarwal
basicInfo.bio: I like to listen Music and have a special interest towards web development  Functional UI gives me joy and I love to add functionality to user interfaces and create amazing web stuff

projects.name: Socket Screen Share (Minor 2)
projects.description: It was a networking based project in which we tried to implement screen sharing concept using sockets and python

projects.name: Recommendation Engine
projects.description: A simple web app which took user travel choices like cost , adventure , food etc and suggested best possible travel options. Tech Stack - Node JS , MongoDB , HTML , CSS , Javascript

projects.name: India Meets (Minor 1)
projects.description: A web based project in which user can create, edit, join and search for events like social events, educational events etc. Tech Stack used - Node JS, Express JS, Angularjs, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, MaterializeCSS

projects.name: Red Connect
projects.description: A Web project in which users can request for blood and also users can also add request to donate blood . Tech Stack used - Jquery, HTML, Materialize CSS
